simplecv.beta.hej.padding module¶

simplecv.beta.hej.padding.pad_coco_bbox(coco_file, min_size=96, pad_size=3, suffix=None)[source]¶

Padding coco file with min_size and pad_size.

Arguments:

coco_file (str): The path of a json file with coco format min_size (int): If box w/h less this, will be padding pad_size (int): Padding box with pad_size suffix (str): Default None

Examples:
>>> coco_file = '/data/dataset1/coco.json'
>>> pad_coco_bbox(coco_file, min_size=96, pad_size=3, suffix=None)
>>> # Save to '/data/dataset1/coco.json.pad96_3'
